price: 83. (Xus) Ayyuub markuu u dhawaaqay Rabbigi (isagoo leh): Waxaa I taabtay dhib (jirro iyo dad iyo duunyo beel), Adiguna waxaad tahay (Allow) Kan ugu Naxariista Badan inta naxariista.”
arabic: ۞ وَأَيُّوبَ إِذۡ نَادَىٰ رَبَّهُۥٓ أَنِّي مَسَّنِيَ ٱلضُّرُّ وَأَنتَ أَرۡحَمُ ٱلرَّٰحِمِينَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: wa-ayyūba idh nādā rabbahu annī massaniya al-ḍuru wa-anta arḥamu al-rāḥimīna
